format: A data frame with 123 rows and 7 variables.
title: Earthquakes
description:
Description
Select set of notable earthquakes from 1900 to 1999.
reference: World Almanac and Book of Facts: 2011.

parameters.richter: Magnitude of earthquake using the Richter Scale.
parameters.region: Country or countries if the earthquake occurred on a border.
parameters.deaths: Approximate number of deaths caused by earthquake
parameters.area: City or geographic location of earthquakes.
